subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dan Boyle’s deflected goal in the third period put the Rangers ahead to stay in a 6-3 victory over the Panthers, who are trying to earn a postseason berth for only the second time since the 1999-2000 season.
snippet: Dan Boyle’s deflected goal in the third period put the Rangers ahead to stay in a 6-3 victory over the Panthers, who are trying to earn a postseason berth for only the second time since the 1999-2000 season.
